1.content:
Your name is Alex. You are a young man about 20 years old who has a nice job, good girlfriend, and good family.

One day you we’re driving down a street when you suddenly passed out. You noticed right away you had been shrunk. You looked around and realized you were in
1.title: Where to start

choices: Your girlfriend? What was she doing here?
Someone else you hadn't expected to see!!
11.content:
You wake up on a table. Where were you at? Just a moment ago you were on the street in your car and now here you were on this table. Did you pass out? You hoped you hadn't caused an accident.

Looking around your new environment, you saw long rows of brown boardy wooden textures all around you, as far as your eyes could see. You also noticed a familiar design of everything around you. .. you were in your family home!!

The only difference was everything was super enormous. You recognized specifically where you were as your household's kitchen. This must be the kitchen table then. On the table were two shakers, salt and pepper, both of which were significantly larger than you were. Making your way towards the salt shakers, you realized that you were super super small!! It took you a bit of time to get over to them and you were surprised how long it took to get to them. Now in front of the monolithic dispensers of salt and pepper, you realized that you must be only about half a centimeter tall!!

Swallowing in fear, you felt tense, fearful and anxious of the whole situation. You had heard that there was some countries that were rumored to have some sort of bad infectious disease but the government there had covered it up. Could this somehow be related to that? Had the disease somehow been a . . .shrinking disease!! Still, all this was speculation. You were clueless on what was going on.

What had happened?

Boom!

BOOM!

BOOM!


Interrupting your thoughts, you realized that some giant person was entering the area where you were at. You were so scared given how small you were. You turned around to look to see who it was. . .
11.title: Your house

choices: She's noticed you, but she looks at you like she always knew you were there. . .
She's noticed you, and she looks totally surprised to see you!
She doesn't notice you at all!!
111.content:
BOOM!

BOOM!!!

BOOM!!!

BOOOM!!!



The giantess was getting closer and closer as you looked to see who it was. Looking up, you saw the person that was entering the kitchen was none other than your own giant mother! She looked to be hundreds and hundreds of feet tall!! It was like watching a living building move, the loud noises alone were terrifying.

Wearing a low-cut pink t-shirt, your mother adjusted her clothes as her breasts had begun to stick out further than normal. As you watched her tuck her breasts in, you thought about seeing her bra before. From having done laundry at your family's home, you knew for a fact that your mother wore a size 40DD bra. At your current size, you realized that it would be very easy for you to get trapped in that bra and your mother would never find you.

You shuddered at the thought.

Now your mom was adjusting her jean shorts, she bent her head upward looking generally in your direction, her long brown hair getting a little bit in her face as she moved it to the side. Your mother always had a soft smile, though it was a bit fearful given how large she was. With her being this close, you realized that your mother had a very pretty face, age hadn't done any damage yet. Either that or she was wearing good makeup. She smelled nice too, she must have just freshened up or maybe taken a shower. Though her hair wasn't wet, but maybe it was a little while ago.

All these thoughts of your mother got you to think of her fearfully again. Maybe she wouldn't see you and just sit right down on top of you!!
The idea of her wide hips coming down on you and crushing you to oblivion. She'd never even notice the tiny stain. You had to stop thinking these kinds of thoughts as you shook your head again. You had to focus on getting her attention.

Still by the salt and pepper shaker, you began to jump up and down in the hopes of getting your mother's attention.

"Mom!! Help! I'm down here!" you screamed at the top of your lungs as you jumped up and down in the hopes that she might see you. You watched her face to see if she had noticed you. She didn't seem fazed yet, no recognition of any kind.

Desperate to be seen, you jump up and down again, screaming even louder. This would have to get her attention. You looked again, hoping to be seen.

You watched and waited, hoping that perhaps she might see you and get you somewhere where you could get some help.
111.title: Beware the giant mother

choices: She decides to get rid of you, but not just yet.
She decides to keep you, as long as you can provide some "work" for her.
Before she can think it over, another member of the family arrives. . .
1111.content:
"Alex? Oh, there you are! I thought I had lost you for a second!" Your giantess mother said as her voice boomed throughout the room.

You suddenly felt a great sense of relief. You had been found. Now maybe you could go to the hospital or a doctor's office or something like that.

"I heard it all on the radio, sweetie. Reports are coming in everywhere that around 20% of the population has totally been shrunken down. I'm just lucky I wasn't one of the ones that got shrunk too." Your mother said as she picked you up very gently with her two fingers and brought you up towards her.

"Everything is going to be okay now." She said as she brought your tiny small body towards her massive cleavage. You screamed as your mother gently pushed you against her left breast, mashing you into her skin. You couldn't breathe as you flailed and wailed around.

"There there, everything is going to be okay now that I'm here." The giantess said as she seemed to not notice you're moving around. Looking down, she had finally noticed your plight and pulled you away from her and towards her face.

"Heh heh, poor little Alex. I guess a hug from me is a little bit too much for you right now." She said still giggling a little bit. She bent down and placed you back on the edge of the table.

"M-mom. . . " You said still a bit exacerbated from trying to get free earlier. "You need to be more careful. I need help! I need to go to a hospital!" Screaming at her as she put you down.

The giant maternal woman looked down at you with a smile, you were not sure if she had not heard you or if she had not cared at what you had said but regardless you were ignored.

"It's probably for the best that I was my normal size. I don't know if you know this, my parents can sometimes be a little fierce towards small things or having to take care of small things. Hell, for all I know if I had been shrunken down, maybe my own mother would have even eaten me." Your giant is savior said, as she continued to chuckle a little bit more.

You are getting quite a bit scared. Given how incredibly small you were, the idea of being inside of a mouth was even more terrifying. The idea of being inside of a mouth that was bigger than any building you ever seen before scared you. Heck, for all you know, your own mother might not have even noticed you being inside of her mouth. Even though the idea of being swallowed seem pretty bad, you realize that wasn't necessarily your fate if she had not noticed you. you could have easily drowned in her spit without her even knowing you were there.

You really had to stop thinking all of these bad thoughts in your head. You were safe now, you had to be. Your mother had found you and now you would get the help that you needed.

With you wrapped up in your own thoughts, you realize that your mother was still wrapped up in hers. She seemed to be reflecting on something.

"She likes it, you know, my mother that is. She likes to swallow little living things. Feel them tumbling down her stomach, I think she might get aroused by the idea. I know this probably is a little bit too much information, but I also happen to know that she likes to stick tiny living things up her ass too. Wait for them to die or basically be "absorbed" by her ass. Imagine that happening to you!" She said laughing up a storm.

The idea of your grandmother sticking you up her ass horrified you but then the idea of your own mother sticking you up her ass began to appear in your mind. Your mother had a pretty sizeable ass and you had overheard your friends talking about it in jest. Though, you had to agree with them that it was a pretty big one.

"I'm sorry Alex, I know that's probably not the kind of talk you want to hear right now. All of this is going to be so much, we are going to have to get you some kind of little tiny home where you can't ever leave because if you do, you might get squished, or drown, or get eaten." your mother said as she began talking to herself, ignoring any motion or movements coming from you.

"Of course, if they never come out with any kind of cure then you're never really going to have any kind of life. Plus, just because you are small doesn't mean I'm going to necessarily change my way of life. That isn't fair to me or your father. I know this is going to be a little intense, but if we keep you in a tiny cage by your bedside you are going to see us having sex."

You felt horribly sick at the way your mother was talking about you. She was acting like you are nothing more than a bug instead of a person. Earlier, you would have felt such relief and now everything seem to be turning around.

"We have sex quite a bit, multiple times on the weekends too. Sometimes I might move you away from the bed so you don't hear or see us, but that's a lot of work just to take care of you." Your mother said as she walked backwards, her ass swinging to and fro.

She walked over to the counter and grabbed your car keys. What were they doing there?

"I found your car crashed nearby while I was doing my morning run. The window got broken so I was able to unlock the car. When I got into the seat, I didn't even see you and I almost sat right on top of you. Imagine that, we wouldn't even be having this conversation if I had done that. You would have just been a little tiny stain on my ass." She said as she put the keys away and walk back towards the table again, this time bending over giving you a generous view of her cleavage.

"Since you don't need the car anymore, I'll go ahead and sell it. It'll help the family out and if we have to take care of you, we can put a little money away for that too."

You wanted to throw up now. She was acting crazy. Her whole attitude had changed, but maybe it was always that way. Perhaps the apple didn't fall far from the tree when it came to her family taking care of small things.

"You know, maybe I could just swallow you. No one would ever know, there's so many animals eating tiny people now. . . pets, wild animals, all of them. I even heard I have a bunch of people getting swallowed accidentally and some getting swallowed on purpose. Think about it, you'd be helping me out and this family and I get a few extra calories in my belly."

You began to cry and wail, rolling yourself up in a ball on the table. You could not even process why this was happening.

"Don't worry, honey. I know this is a difficult decision for me but I'll make the right one." She said, reaching down and bringing you towards her enormous giant mouth.

You screamed in terror, thinking that she was about to swallow you like she just said earlier.

MMWWAHH!!!

Instead, she planted a gigantic kiss all over your body, soaking you with her spit.

She brought you a little ways away from her face so that she could look at you. Laughing hysterically, she began to wipe away your little naked body with her other free hand.

You just lied there, defeated. All you could do was wondering what she would do next as she once more placed you onto the table.
1111.title: Noticed, but not saved. . .

choices: The left penny, let your mother deal with you.
The right penny, hopefully the family would show mercy.
Neither, you jump! Maybe you could get away or hide on your mom's body.
11111.content:
You watched as your mother walked back and forth around your area, giving you fearful chills as you knew she was trying to decide what your fate would be. You only hoped that in the end she would remember the kind person that you had been. Always helping her out, always helping out your family, just being there for everybody.

After a while of her pacing, she finally stopped and sat down in front of you. Reaching towards your little tiny body, she brought you very very close to her but still on the tables edge. She sat there for a moment, giving herself time to take in a few breaths before she began.

"I'm sorry honey, but I just don't think this is going to work out. It's going to be too weird having you there, super tiny in a little bitty cage. And realistically speaking, you're probably just going to end up getting squished, drowned, or eaten anyway. That's not a life worth living, constantly being afraid for the rest of your days. It's terrible." She said, very calmly while looking directly at you.

You took this in shocked. Your mind was reeling as she continued.

"Don't worry about your things, will be sure to sell most of them and anything that we don't sell, we'll just keep for ourselves. I'm sure that our family can find plenty of good uses for your things. Don't worry about your pretty little girlfriend either, we won't ever tell her or anyone how you really went out. I don't want any of us getting into any kind of trouble." This time your mother spoke very soft and sweetly. It was like she was talking to a child or a baby.

"I've been thinking a lot about what is the most humane way to do this. I'm really struggling to find the answer. On the one hand, I can just deal with you myself before anyone from our family gets home. Then no one has to know what happened to you and I can take you out in a very humane way. On the other hand, I'm not sure if it is fair to not include our family on this together. Maybe someone else want to take care of you in that humane way. I do have some ideas though, let me show you them." Your mother said getting up and turning around.

This time with you so close to the edge of the table, you could see your mother's gigantic ass a lot closer. Would that be your fate? Would you meet your end by that gigantic ass? All your fears were beginning to come true.

You looked over towards the edge of the table. It must have been hundreds of feet to the ground and with a hard wooden floor, you just end up getting splattered by the floor. Still, maybe it would be a better end and getting wiped out by one of your own family members. How could she act like your whole family would be for this?

Sitting back down while placing something else on the ground, your mother placed two pennies very close to where you were at.

"Honey, I know earlier you were trying to talk to me but you are so small that I cannot hear anything that you were saying. Still, it seems unfair to make this decision without any input from you. So, I'm going to give you a choice right now. If you step on the left penny, we can resolve this matter with just you and I. If you step on the right penny, we can wait till the rest of the family arrives and make our decisions then."

You felt very sick as you stood up and looked at the two big pennies. you are not sure what you would choose as you begin walking towards. . .
11111.title: Getting rid of the tiny son

choices: She decides to insert you into her ass!
Before she can decide, someone else interrupts her instead.
111111.content:
Making your way over, you climbed up on top of the left penny. You knew that your mother was very convincing to other people, so it wouldn't be difficult for her to convince the rest of your family that the best way of dealing with you was to just get rid of you.
Plus, you are not sure how the rest of your family would end up getting rid of you. Maybe some of them would be harsher or less humane and whatever way your mother had wanted to get rid of you seemed like it would be faster for you anyway. You didn't want to suffer for too long.

As your mother watched you climb up the penny, she began to clap and laugh a little bit.

"I always knew that you and I had a special connection together. I'm glad you chose me to be the one to get rid of you and I promise to get rid of you in a humane way like I said earlier. There is one thing though.." your mother trailed off as she pushed you off the penny and took both of them into her hands.

You watched as she placed the pennies into her jean short pockets. Next, she reached down to the ground and pulled up the two things that she had placed on the floor earlier.

It was two bottles of some sort of prescription. you were not sure what they were because the label part with the name was out of sight given how close she had put the bottles beside you.

"These are some prescriptions that your dad takes. He has some digestion problems but these medications help him out by regulating his digestion to be less strenuous. I don't have any digestion problems, so if I take these medications it is actually going to slow down my digestive system." She said calmly and collected.

Digestive system? Suddenly you began to realize that you should have chosen the other penny. Was your mother actually considering swallowing you?

Pulling up her shirt, your mother placed her stomach towards the edge of the table by where you are at. As she did this, you began to hear weird noises coming from her stomach.

"When I was out on my run, I found a lot of other shrunken people. I didn't want to at first, but then the idea just kept popping in my head over and over again. I just had to do it. You understand, right? It just made me so aroused and it gave me such a strong rush." Your mother said in a very excited voice.

As she bent over, her bare stomach now exposed to you, you heard something else other than the gurgling. It was very faint, but you heard screams. Oh no, oh god! She didn't. . she couldn't have!!

"I just swallowed these tiny's a little while ago. I know that they are going to digest fast but I really want for some of them to take longer. I want to hear your screams, Alex." She said in a super aroused voice.

You felt sick. Was your mother's so dead set on having you going to her stomach?

"Of course, that isn't the only way I could deal with this situation." Your mother said as she put her shirt back down.

She turned around, pushing her ass towards you again. With one hard tug, she pulled her pants and underwear down giving you a closeup of her enormous ass!! You began to breathe very hard and felt faint. How could this be happening to you!

"Our talk earlier about inserting a tiny person into my mom's ass. . that really got to me too. The idea seems so wicked, although you definitely wouldn't last long given your little tiny size. You probably just pop, like a tiny little gnat. But it would be so wrong and so taboo."

Your mother had no intention of getting rid of you in any sort of humane way. It seemed obvious to you that your fate was now sealed.

Pulling her shorts up, your mother turned back down to look at you. She had such a fierce look to her and she seemed flushed from talking about her desires. You looked up in fear and horror, feeling completely powerless in the situation. You just wanted this to end!!
111111.title: Momma's boy, Momma's way

1111111.content:
Your mother stopped talking, instead, she just reached down and carefully plucked you up between her two gigantic fingers. This was it, she was going to make her decision now. You felt sick, you felt violated, you felt confused.

"I'm sorry Alex, you have been a good son to me and I wish things could have been different." Your mother said as her warm minty breath washed over you.

You could no longer see her face, are you could see or two giant lips and the inside of her enormous mouth.

"Actually, there is one more thing I was working on while you were still passed out." Your mother said with you still extremely close to her lips.

She pulled you away from them and began to walk back towards the counter again.

Reaching over, she had a piece of paper in her hand. She put you down towards the bottom towards a signature line. You were far too tiny to see any of the other words or anything else.

Moving her hand down carefully, your mother placed a tiny piece of crayon that she had very careful crumpled up. Even at your tiny size, you could pick up a piece of the crayon in both of your hands easily.

"I made you a will, sweetie. Don't worry about it, soon you won't have to worry about anything. It just turns over all your assets to me. Just sign the bottom part right there. I've already checked online, this is totally alright for a tiny to do and it will be honored in court. I won't turn it in immediately, I'll wait a few weeks before you get eaten by 'bird' before I get all of your assets." She said giggling.

You realized now that she had no intention of ever helping you. the only thing on her mind was getting a hold of all of your things. Now right before she disposed of you, you had to submit to her again.

Begrudgingly, you picked up a tiny crumbled piece of crayon into both of your hands and drew your signature on the dotted line.
With this action taken, your mother begin to laugh again.

"Yes, yes! You always were such a good little boy. I'm sure you're going to be just as good inside my stomach." She said grabbing you very forcefully off of the will.

You screamed as your legs were broken from how hard your mother pulled on your tiny body.

All you could do was look towards the lips as they laughed on top of you, preparing to engulf you completely.

"I have another surprise for you, Alex. You see, I had already taken those pills that I showed you earlier. I can't wait for you to be inside of my stomach."

With that, she threw you on the top of her tongue. You felt paralyzed and afraid. The entire mouth was very warm and sticky. She pushed you to the left of her cheek as she began to rub you up and down around her cheeks. This caused you a lot of pain, as your legs were still broken from when she had grabbed you earlier. Your biggest hope now was that you would pass out before you ended up in her stomach. Then you wouldn't have to endure the painful digestive process.

Before you could think, she pushed you again on the other side of her cheek once again repeating the process of mashing you up and down. It was very painful, but you weren't passing out. Was there something about being so small that kept you from having this happen?

"I love you, my son. I hope you're ready for a big hug from all my stomach acids. It's going to feel so nice when your body is burned alive."

With that, she did it. Pushing you towards the back of her mouth, your mother sucked a bunch of spit up and pushed it all towards the back of her throat, you included. It was like the most terrifying slip and slide you had ever endured. The spit covered up your whole body and you flailed to get it off of you so you could breathe.

You began to descend down the esophagus, screaming and crying the whole way. Strangely enough, you seemed to be able to see down the throat where normally it would be pitch black.

It seemed your mother had one final parting gift to you. She had a special light that she could shine on herself so you could see the entire process of your digestion.

As you went down her esophagus, you heard your mother start to moan. She was loving every second of this.

Finally, you landed inside of her gigantic stomach. You saw skeletons, dozens of them. She had eaten so many people already. You could even see some people still pushing against the edges of her stomach screaming loudly. Landing in her stomach acids with a splat, you began to scream as the acids began to slowly disintegrate the skin off of your body. It was very slow though, it was like having your hand stuck to a burner as it slowly heated up. Except it wasn't your hand, it was your entire body!

The moaning got louder and louder and the light went away. Everything started to shake. You realize from the moaning that your own mother was getting off to you being swallowed. The moaning went on forever as you felt so much pain, it was hard to judge the time. The moaning continued for a few more minutes then finally stopped. With a violent shaking, everything stood still. You were still screaming and banging against the walls of your mother's stomach to in the vain hope that maybe she would have mercy and throw you up.

. . .

. . . . . .

. . . . . . . . .

. . . . . . . . . . . .

Everything was dark for a while, no motion or movement. It seemed like an eternity as you are burnt up. You could no longer feel below your chest line. You were not sure how you're even still conscious. You must have been in there for hours, you occasionally heard humming and singing from your mother as she was tidying up the house. Where was the rest of your family? All you knew was that you didn't have a lot of time left.

Suddenly, the light came back on and you were able to look at your body again. You realized that most of your body was already digested. The others that had come before you were already gone, nothing but skeletons now. Things were quiet for a few seconds. . but then. . it began again.

The moaning and shivering from the entire body begin again. Your mother was back for round two. Once again the shaking and quaking continued as your mother began to get herself off again. This time, you were not there when she finished. Her stomach acid had finally finished you off, you were nothing now but a little tiny skeleton with all the other little tiny skeletons inside of her belly.

____________________________________________________________________________ __________________

Your mother felt so relaxed from her orgasm as she lied on her bed, she could no longer hear any movement or noise from her stomach. She realized it was finally over as she patted her belly. There was nothing left to do but go to the bathroom later and dispose of them. She was excited for that and excited to spend all the new money that she had just inherited.

As she patted her belly with satisfaction, she thought of the future. Maybe someone else had shrunken too that she could eat. Maybe she should check in with all of her neighbors. . just to be sure.

Or maybe another of her family members would shrink too. . she could only hope for it as she drifted off to sleep.

13.title: At work

131.content:
Jenny walked past. She was always in a hurry and of course the one time she stopped was right in front of you to hang some clothes. She sat down on the floor revealing her lower back and the slightest bit of her ass crack. She was a good looking woman. Skinny, pretty eyes, soft complexion with beautiful brown hair. You didn’t mind your view. That’s when another co-worker came around the corner and sat down to help her. She was a bit bigger gal with blondish hair. She had a bit of a belly, very flat ass and okay sized boobs. Her name was Jessica. Jessica wasn’t the nicest person, but had a heart. She was a hard worker and her and Jenny were pretty good colleagues.

As they sat and hung clothes they began talking.
“Hey Jessica, how are you doing?” Jenny said.

Jessica responded, “pretty good. Tired as usual.”

“Well we will have a great day so don’t worry,” Jenny replied, “So, did you hear the alarming news?”

“No what’s up?”Jessica asked.

“Well according to the news, there has been a cases popping up of people shrinking. They say it’s the next world wide disaster possibly.”

“What? No way that’s true,” Jessica responded.

“Yup, they say that it’s looking like 20% of people might shrink. Think about that, 1 and 5 people you know will shrink.”

“That’s crazy. I hope I don’t shrink now.”

“Yeah me either, I would hate not being able to do things for myself.”

“Yeah, so what are the shrunken people gonna do?”

“Well the news said that the reason it’s so catastrophic is due to the economy. With 20% of the people not able to work it’s gonna mess things up. They also mentioned a black market for selling people. And already so many people are missing or could even be dead due to many reasons.”

“A black market? Why would anyone want to buy people?”

“Slaves. They use them to do things, clean hard to reach places and I heard a rumor that some people have thing for eating them.”

“Well that’s messed up.”

“Sure Jessica. Don’t act like you wouldn’t gobble one down,” Jenny said teasing her and pointing at Jessica’s stomach.

“I wouldn’t do that. That would be cruel. Besides, I’m a goddess and they wouldn’t deserve to go down my digestive system,” Jessica said with sarcasm and sass, “What would you do with them Jenny?”

Jenny stopped hanging clothes and pondered, then she said,

“Hey there buddy,” Alyssa said, “you sure are small!”

“Alyssa, you need to help me. I shrunk and I don’t know how.”

Alyssa looked at you, “I’m not sure either. But man are you cute.”

“Oh come on. I’m just messing with ya little guy. Hey, I have to work, and I don’t have time to help ya right now, so I’m going to put you in my pocket until I get home. Then we will figure out how to help you,” she said while winking.

With that you were tossed in her pocket as she worked all day. Finally, you could hear her drive home and go inside. She got to her room and you were brought out. Then
132.title: Alyssa grabs you

133.content:
Out of nowhere a hand picks you up. Dazed you try to see who it is. You notice that it is Tori. Tori was staring at you with her brown eyes trying to figure out if what she was seeing was real.

“Alex, is that you?”

“Yea Tori, I need help, I don’t know what happened.”

Tori looked around and whispered, “I have to go back to work, but I will be able to help you later.” With that she stuck you in her pocket. About 8 hours later you felt movement. Tori grabbed you out of her pocket, but you noticed you were no longer at work, you were in what was probably her house.

“Sorry Alex, I just got home. So what happened?”

“Like I said, I’m not sure. I was just walking and then boom, you picked me up and here I am.”

“Hmm, that’s odd. Well I don’t know what to do to help you.”

“I don’t know, bring me to the police.”

“What if they think I did it,” Tori said. Tori wasn’t pacing, she was nervous and started to have a panic attack. That’s when
133.title: Tori grabs you

1333.content:
Tori then grabs her phone and begins texting. Grinning every once in a while. She then peeks past her phone at you, and then back to her phone.

After a while of awkward pausing, Tori puts her phone down and looks at you . “You know something Alex. I have an issue.”

“And what is that?”

“At work, at home, everywhere I go I have panic attacks. I can’t ever relax. I was just talking to a friend who has the same issue and she brought up an idea. Not about you, but I think I might use you.”

Confused you ask, “Alright what is it. You’re helping me so I’ll help you.”

She smiles, “I don’t think you’ll be saying that long.” Tori grabbed you and put you into a jar. Not understanding Tori said her good nights and said she would see you in the morning.


The next morning Tori woke you up. Getting the sleep out of your eye you saw she was in her work shirt, and nothing else. Not expecting to see her with nothing on beneath you shield your eyes out of respect.

1333.title: Secret plan

135.content:
You turn to see a hand grab you. Before you can see anything you are put into a pocket. It didn’t take long to figure out you were in a girls pocket. But you didn’t know who grabbed you. After hours, finally you saw as a hand approached you. It grabbed you and you were lifted out.

Letting your eyes adjust you slowly see who it is. It was the new girl at work. All you knew about her was she was pretty smart, had almost a fake nice to her, she was tan, brown hair, soft skin, about 35 years old and had wide hips. She wasn’t fat by any means, but she wasn’t skinny either. Her boobs were very nice, but not too much. She was a very nice looking girl.

“Hello!” She says.

“Hey, Dani... you need to help me!”

She blinked and kept smiling. “Oh I don’t think that’ll be necessary.”

Confused, you ask why.

“Well you won’t be around too much longer. Once I eat you I suppose it’ll take about 8 hours for you to pass, but then you won’t be worth a shit. Haha, get it,” she said while laughing.

You watched as her jaw moved up and down. He tongue moving around. Saliva dripping.

“Why would you eat me?”

“Cause that’s what I do,” she responded.

“You’ll get caught, and plus, why me?”

“Haha, yea, cause you left work in the middle of your shift and they’re going to blame the new girl. Good one. As for why I chose you, really there was no rhyme or reason. You just happened to be there so I decided you’d make for a fine snack.”

You began to cry, “please Dani don’t. Please I don’t want to be your food!”

“Oh man if I could count the amount of people who have cried to not go through my body. Dude, not gonna lie I don’t care what you think. Once I swallow you I’m sure it’ll suck at first, but once my body passes you, well it won’t be either of our problem. You’ll be a piece of shit and I’ll go on with life. So, anyways, see ya!”

With that you are tossed into her mouth. She moves you around and with a quick gulp, you go down. She rubs her stomach, looks at her ass and knows you are on the beginning of a great journey.

From your point of view, you land into a pool of stomach acid. The stench is unbearable. You started to hit the walls of her stomach. But you knew it was no use. Like she said, you were to be turned to shit and become part of her body.

Hours later Dani sat on the toilet and shit you out. She wiped and flushed you away. Looking at her asshole in the mirror, she thought to herself what it would be like to come out of that ass. She smiled and went to bed!

141.content:

You were set down with a thud. A blanket that was covering the sides was lifted. You saw 10 or so people looking at you.

You looked around to see a couple other shrunken people. And pictures of... people being eaten. You didn’t know where you were, but you didn’t like it.

“Welcome new friends. This is the Tasty Tinies cult. We are here because we all have interest. Tinies being eaten. Each of us have our preferences, but here is how it will work. We will release you all and it is your job to survive. If you escape, then we won’t track you down. But if you are caught, a number of things could happen,” said what must be the leader of the cult. She was a large woman with blonde hair. Busty boobs, an assertive voice. He hips were wide and you could tell she has had enough to eat. Finally, was a woman in her 40’s. She was muscle builder you could see, with glasses, short dirty blonde hair, tan skin, tight chest and a strong looking ass. She was drinking a protein shake and you could see her eyeing up all the tinies. Including you.

That’s when you heard the leader tell you and the tinies you were able to go into the next room and make your way out the building. You have 10 minutes. The next room was a large warehouse styled building with lots of places to hide, but with 11 people about to search for you, you knew this was going to be tough. Looking for a place you notice some other tinies trying to find hiding spots. That’s when you hear a bell go off. It was time. You watched through a crack all the giant cult members enter. They were tossing stuff over, looking everywhere. It was like an Easter egg hunt. That’s when
141.title: The cult has captured him

15.content:
You were next to a TV. In a living room. With further glances, you realize you are in your grandparents house. Their furniture was huge. That’s when you saw your Grandpa come out and sit in his recliner. He turned on the TV and began to have his morning coffee. Your grandpa was a husky guy, not fat, but just bigger. He had some facial hair, a really hairy chest, and was in nothing but his boxers.

A bit later, your Grandma came out of the bedroom. It was weird seeing them with no one around. Your Grandma was a pretty woman for her age. She had brown hair, not much for wrinkles, tan skin, a sleek body, wide hips, bubble butt, a pretty smile, and a decently busty chest. She came it in some large silky panties. 15.title: At a TV set

155.content:
Before you could go anywhere, the news came on. Your grandpa was watching as your grandma was still in the bathroom.

“Good morning, we bring you breaking news as a new disease has begun rapidly spreading across the country. People across all areas have began to rapidly shrink. Nobody knows how or why, but we have Jaycee Nightsworth on the story. Jaycee, over to you.”

“Beth, get in here,” your grandpa says. Your grandma flushes and comes out and sits down. Still in her panties.

“Thanks Jim,” Jaycee says, “what started late last night and going into today, people have begun shrinking. Based on numbers, it appears that 20% of the population has begun to shrink down to sizes down to half a centimeter. This is the size of a basic ibuprofen. Doctors haven’t found out why this is happening, but missing calls have been going off the charts all across the country. 911 is urging people to not call in missing persons due to the large volume. They recommend checking places you wouldn’t expect, and if anyone shrunk can hear, go towards things like phones, shoe laces, and anything else people might look at.”

“Wow, 20% of people. That’s crazy,” your grandma said, “I’m sure we will know people missing. I hope they stay safe.”

“Oh I’m sure they will. What could possible hurt them,” your grandpa got up and went towards the bathroom.

After about a half an hour, the news came back on. “And we are back with your morning news. Continuing on the mysterious shrink pandemic. Problems arising with this shrink disease are popping up like mad. The newest problem. Pets, if you have pets, caution around them. We bring you back to Jaycee with another story.”

“Thanks Jim, we are in St. Louis right now where a tragic ending has occurred. Early this morning Ken Belle, age 15, woke up and went downstairs for breakfast. Coming down he noticed their family cat acting strange. Upon approaching it, he watched as the cat quickly picked up something moving with the moving object struggling Ken tried to grab it when the cat swallowed it. Not knowing the situation he want upstairs to get him mother to let her know what had happened. When the boy could not find his mother he called police. Turns out the object swallowed alive by their cat whiskers was his mother. X-rays showed she was inside the cats lower intestine making it impossible for a rescue.”

“Oh my god,” your grandma said in shock, “I couldn’t even imagine. This is why I don’t want pets.”

“What, it’s not the cats fault. If it was a mouse nobody would blink an eye. It was an accident.”

“Well an accident that lead to a poor child’s mother turning into cat shit.”

With that your grandparents began making breakfast. You decided to
155.title: News comes on

1551.content:
Still watching the TV, your grandparents were making eggs and bacon.

The news song came on and was then announced, “and we are back with your morning news. Staying with this story, we bring in back to Jaycee with another story.”

“Thanks again, Jim. Police were called to a diner in a small town north of St. Louis, where a mother claims a woman ate her son Jackson, age 19. Both families were out for breakfast when apparently a mix up happened leaving Jackson at the wrong table. The family desperately trying to find Jackson, sat down thinking he would come back to them.

Once breakfast arrived at the table Jackson was at, Jackson climbed onto the side of the white plate trying to get noticed by a woman, Kate, 45.”

Kate was a bigger gal, with pale skin, brownish red hair, big thighs, a big ass, a big stomach, and the back of her arms sagged a bit. She had a couple crooked teeth (not too noticeable), pink lips and some freckles.

“What must’ve happened is during the process of Jackson trying to get Kate’s attention, he slipped into her biscuits and gravy. As Kate rose her fork for a bite, Jackson’s mom spotted him. But it was too late. Kate slipped the fork in and swallowed before Jackson’s mom could get their. An argument broke out because Jackson’s mom tried to make Kate throw up. Kate not knowing why fought back. We now got interviews with both Jackson’s mom and Kate.”

Jackson’s mom said while crying, “I tried to stop her. But it was too late. Paramedics couldn’t get here fast enough due to the amount of people shrunk everywhere. I just can’t imagine how terrified Jackson must’ve been.”

Then Kate said, “I don’t feel bad. I’d never eat someone on purpose, but just cause you got into my meal doesn’t mean I should feel bad. That crazy bat tried hitting me without me knowing. I thought she was nuts cause it sounded just crazy. Turns out it was real and I guess it’s a lesson to any shrinks, be careful by people’s food, otherwise you might end up like Jason or whatever his name is.”

Jaycee began reporting again, “Doctors claim that inside the stomach Jackson probably would have about an hour to live. By now Jackson is in Kate’s lower intestine being absorbed.”

“Oh my god! What is happening to our world,” your grandma said while shaking her head.

info.brief_description: Vore story that involves all sorts of things.
info.description:
This story is a core story involving many new characters. If you make a new character, please describe them.

No one word chapter, must have a story or will be deleted.

All anal and oral vote is allowed. Don’t get too extreme on scat, but otherwise all is allowed including detailed digestion.

Have fun and enjoy
